column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Kiet - Thank you for your review. Please know that you can always inform your server at the time of your meal that if you dislike our food for any reason
column2: our chefs will remake your dish or offer something different that might better suit your palate. In this case
column3: we can always prepare your ramen with "Less Salt." This particular parameter
column5: is highly subjective and every customer reacts differently. Regardless
column6: we appreciate your visit and your taking the time to review us.
